title: Shooting Hero
synopsis: A music video for the song "Shooting Hero" by Duke Aces. Aired as part of NHK's Minna no Uta program from April to May 1986.
staff: [['Yamamoto, Masayuki', ['Theme Song Composition', ' Theme Song Lyrics']], ['Duke Aces', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Watanabe, Hiroya', ['Theme Song Arrangement']], ['Nanke, Kouji', ['Animation Director']]]
